name: obsidian-google-drive-synced-vault
author: Diogo Palhais
description: Google Drive Synced Vault - Advanced two-way sync between Obsidian and Google Drive with folder sync, conflict resolution, and support for all file types

scripts.clean: del main.js styles.css 2>nul || echo Files not found
scripts.release: npm run build && cp manifest.json LICENSE README.md release/
scripts.release:windows: npm run build && if not exist release mkdir release && copy release\main.js release\ && copy manifest.json release\ && copy LICENSE release\ && copy README.md release\
